name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
With a robust background in project management and team coordination, I excel in driving initiatives that enhance customer liaison and facilitate continuous improvement in operational processes. Over 8 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer has equipped me with advanced technical skills, including proficiency in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** technologies. I have successfully developed enterprise-grade platforms leveraging **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, complemented by extensive experience in cloud technologies such as **Azure** and **AWS**.  
  
My ability to develop and implement complex solutions is matched by my strong understanding of mechanical assembly and electrical schematics, enhancing my contributions in multi-disciplinary environments. I am committed to ensuring industrial maintenance standards while leading projects that focus on process engineering, ensuring adherence to compliance and security standards. My skills in communication enable me to effectively bridge technical teams and customer needs, facilitating project success in challenging environments.
